scripts.db:migrate: node -e "require('dotenv').config();if(!process.env.DIRECT_URL){console.error('DIRECT_URL required for migrations');process.exit(1)}" && prisma migrate dev
scripts.db:push: node -e "require('dotenv').config();if(!process.env.DIRECT_URL){console.error('DIRECT_URL required for db:push');process.exit(1)}" && prisma db push
scripts.db:constraints: node -e "require('dotenv').config();const u=process.env.DIRECT_URL;if(!u){console.error('DIRECT_URL required for db:constraints');process.exit(1)}const{Pool}=require('pg');const fs=require('fs');const ssl=u.includes('supabase.com')||u.includes('supabase.co')||u.includes('sslmode=require')?{rejectUnauthorized:false}:undefined;const p=new Pool({connectionString:u,ssl});p.query(fs.readFileSync('prisma/check_constraints.sql','utf8')).then(()=>{console.log('CHECK constraints applied');p.end()}).catch(e=>{console.error(e);p.end();process.exit(1)})"
scripts.db:setup: prisma db push && npm run db:constraints && prisma db seed
